item.title: Exciting Trends in Web Technology
item.description: Web tech is so fricken exciting right now. Offline-First Web DevelopmentSingle Page AppsResponsive Web DesignProgressive Web AppsFull Stack JavaScriptDocker ContainerizationMicroservicesServerless FaaS AppsBlockchainNone of these technologies are new in a sense. But it seems to me there's lots of activity around these topics this year.
